entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:43 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:43 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:43 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023
